001package imagingbook.lib.util.progress;
002
003/**
004 * Monitored objects must implement this interface.
005 * @author WB
006 * 
007 */
008public interface ProgressReporter {
009        
010        /**
011         * Returns a value in [0,1) indicating to which degree the
012         * task associated with this object is complete.
013         * @return a value between 0 and 1
014         */
015        public double getProgress();
016
017}
